Series II. Personnel: Vice President and Director: Robert M. Steed Files
Time Inc. Human Resources and Personnel Records
Time Inc. Human Resources and Personnel Records

Subsidiaries contains correspondence between Robert Steed in the corporate personnel office and staff from the subsidiary companies owned by Time Inc. The records include discussion on how to adjust, incorporate or combine the subsidiary's original policies and benefits with Time Inc.'s; reports on benefits, compensation, and personnel statistics; and employee handbooks.
